posts.post_title: Reduced!  sp and tough T205's for sale
posts.post_content:
Hey guys, Got some tougher 05's for sale here.  All prices are including shipping and as always, feel free to make offers. I can email better scans.

Sold: Bresnahan mouth open: Nice front, back paper loss now$ 110  $130
Sold: Joss: Pen mark, horizontal crease   $325
Sold: Bender P42: Grill marks, few creases $85
Sold :Baker: good condition overall, few small creases now 75$ $85
Brown Cycle: black ink on front, well worn  now 70$ $75
Sold: Brown American Beauty: solvent damage on front left, now $75 $85

Thanks.

I will take the Bresnahan mouth open for $110

Matt Engle
